= Introduction =

Some commands to get the prerequisites on the system. It assumes GCC/G++, binutils, and friends are already installed.

= Details =

== SafeInt ==

SafeInt3.hpp is included in the ESAPI project directory. No action is needed.

== Crypto++ ==

  # Debian and friends
  $ sudo apt-get install libcrypto++8 libcrypto++8-dbg libcrypto++-dev

  # Fedora and friends
  > su -
  # yum install cryptopp cryptopp-devel

== Boost ==

  # Debian and friends
  $ sudo apt-get install libboost-dbg libboost-dev

  # Fedora and friends
  > su -
  # yum install boost-devel

== Grepping Package ==

Searching packages can be performed as follows (using boost as an example).

  # Debian and friends
  $ apt-cache pkgnames | grep -i boost

  # Fedora and friends
  > yum search boost | grep -i devel
